long_description: The Softride Hang2 bike hitch rack carries 2 bikes vertically without contacting the frame, fork, cables, or other bikes. Simply hang the the bike on the rack, secure with rubber straps and go. Parallelogram design hangs bikes away from the rear of your vehicle so you can open the rear door. Heavy gauge powder-coated steel construction; hanger grips are easily replaced (replacements not included); carries 2 bikes. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes.
short_description: The Softride Hang2 bike hitch rack carries 2 bikes vertically without contacting the frame, fork, cables, or other bikes. Simply hang the the bike on the rack, secure with rubber straps and go.
